events.message: The applicant submitted the personal loan application to cover medical expenses expected over the next few months.
The loan application was categorized under personal loans based on the stated purpose related to medical costs.
A dedicated loan officer was assigned to handle the personal loan application and guide the applicant through the process.
The initial review confirmed the completeness of submitted application forms and verified stated medical loan purpose.
Additional documents were requested from the applicant including medical bills and proof of income for loan verification.
The applicant submitted all requested documents including recent medical bills and pay stubs as proof of income.
Credit check was completed showing satisfactory credit history aligned with personal loan requirements.
Risk assessment conducted indicating acceptable risk level for approving the personal loan application.
An offer detailing the loan amount, interest rate, and repayment terms was presented to the applicant for review.
Applicant provided positive feedback and accepted the loan terms proposed in the offer letter.
The personal loan application was approved by the credit committee after all requirements were satisfactorily met.
Funds were disbursed to the applicantâ€™s linked bank account for use in covering medical and related personal expenses.
A follow-up call was made to ensure the applicant received the funds and to clarify any repayment questions.
The personal loan application file was formally closed after successful funding and initial follow-up completion.
